original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na yang dag pa'i mtha' med pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dben pa gang yin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: in that way, the limit of reality that is not existent, the limit of reality that is empty, the limit of reality that is isolated, the limit of reality that is without entityness,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and the bodhisattva and the past and the future and the middle—all those are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzhan yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽further, because the inconceivable element does not exist, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the past.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the inconceivable element is empty, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the past.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because the inconceivable expanse is void.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past because the inconceivable expanse has no intrinsic nature.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the inconceivable expanse is non-existent.🔽The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the inconceivable expanse is empty.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub @560a *//🔽sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub @560a *// sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the inconceivable expanse is void.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattva is not apprehended in the future because the inconceivable expanse has no intrinsic nature.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the inconceivable expanse is non-apprehensible, the middle of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the inconceivable expanse is empty, the middle of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because the inconceivable expanse is isolated, the middle of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //🔽de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Because the inconceivable expanse is essentially non-apprehensible, the middle of the bodhisattva is non-apprehensible.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: If you ask why, Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽it is because in the inconceivable expanse,🔽the non-apprehension of the inconceivable expanse, the emptiness of the inconceivable expanse, the isolation of the inconceivable expanse, and the essential non-apprehensibility of the inconceivable expanse,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the prior limit is not apprehended,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs /
translated: the later limit is not apprehended,🔽and the present is not apprehended.

original: dbus mi dmigs te /🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: dbus mi dmigs te / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the middle is not apprehended,🔽the inconceivable element is not one thing and emptiness another,🔽the inconceivable element is not one thing and the reality limit another,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the inconceivable element is not one thing and the signless another,🔽the inconceivable element is not one thing and the wishless another,🔽the inconceivable element is not one thing and the uneffected another,🔽the inconceivable element is not one thing and the unborn another,🔽the inconceivable element is not one thing and the unceasing another,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the inconceivable element is not one thing and the insubstantial another,

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽sngon gyi mtha' @560b yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' @560b yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the inconceivable element is not one thing and the bodhisattva another,🔽the past is not one thing and the inconceivable element another,

original: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: the future is not one thing and the inconceivable element another,

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: and the middle is not one thing and the inconceivable element another.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings med pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dben pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang /
translated: Therefore, since the inconceivable expanse is non-existent, the inconceivable expanse is empty, the inconceivable expanse is void, the inconceivable expanse is natureless,

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: and the bodhisattva, the past, the future, and the middle—all these are not two, nor are they divided into two.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: gzhan yang nyan thos /
analyzed: gzhan yang nyan thos /
translated: Furthermore, the śrāvaka is non-existent,

original: med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Therefore, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the past.

original: nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: The śrāvaka is empty,

original: nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the future, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the present, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the past, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the future, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the present, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the past, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //

analyzed: nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir @561a *//

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the future, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the present, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the past, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the future, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

analyzed: nyan thos stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su ma dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the present, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the past, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.🔽Because of the emptiness of the future, the bodhisattva is not apprehended.

original: nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: nyan thos dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because of the emptiness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the signlessness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the wishlessness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the unconditionedness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the nonorigination of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the nonexistence of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

analyzed: nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so // de ci'i phyir zhe na / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: nyan thos med pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid dang / nyan thos dben pa dang; nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs / dbus mi dmigs te /
translated: Because of the signlessness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the wishlessness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the unconditionedness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the nonorigination of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: nyan thos med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: nyan thos med pa'ang gzhan ma yin / nyan thos stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Because of the nonexistence of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.🔽Because of the emptiness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: nyan thos dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /🔽nyan thos de ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: nyan thos dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin / nyan thos de ngo bo nyid med pa'ang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Because of the signlessness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /🔽phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin / sngon gyi mtha' yang gzhan ma yin / phyi ma'i mtha' yang gzhan ma yin /
translated: Because of the wishlessness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
analyzed: dbus kyang gzhan ma yin no //
translated: Because of the unconditionedness of the śrāvaka, the bodhisattva is not apprehended in the middle.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,

original: de ltar na nyan thos med pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar na nyan thos med pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / nyan thos dben pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /
translated: in that way, the nonexistence of śrāvakas, the emptiness of śrāvakas, the isolation of śrāvakas, the naturelessness of śrāvakas, and the bodhisatvas,

original: sngon gyi mtha' gang @561b yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang @561b yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: the prior limit, the later limit, and the middle—all of these are not two, nor are they divided.

original: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /🔽gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu / gzhan yang rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Venerable Śāradvatīputra,🔽in addition, bodhisatvas are not apprehended in the prior limit because pratyekabuddhas do not exist.

original: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Bodhisatvas are not apprehended in the prior limit because pratyekabuddhas are empty.

original: rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //🔽rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so // rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sngon gyi mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because pratyekabuddhas are void, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the limit of the past.🔽Because pratyekabuddhas are essenceless, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the limit of the past.

original: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because pratyekabuddhas do not exist, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the future.🔽Because pratyekabuddhas are empty, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the future.

original: rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //
translated: Because pratyekabuddhas are void, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the future.

original: rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so //🔽rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mthar mi dmigs so // rang sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because pratyekabuddhas are essenceless, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the future.🔽Because pratyekabuddhas do not exist, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the middle.

original: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyi phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: Because pratyekabuddhas are empty, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the middle.

original: rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dben pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //
translated: because pratyekabuddhas are void, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the middle;

original: rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dbus su mi dmigs so //

translated: because pratyekabuddhas are essenceless, bodhisattvas are not apprehended in the middle.

original: zhe na / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /
analyzed: zhe na / tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu /

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas med pa dang / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas dben pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ngo bo nyid med pa la sngon gyi mtha' mi dmigs /

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas med pa'ang gzhan ma yin / rang sangs rgyas stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin /
translated: The nonexistence of pratyekabuddhas is not one thing,🔽the emptiness of pratyekabuddhas is not one thing,

analyzed: rang sangs rgyas dben pa'ang gzhan ma yin /

translated: in that way, the bodhisattva is not one thing and the past limit another, the future limit another, and the middle another.

analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' gang yin pa dang / phyi ma'i mtha' gang yin pa dang / dbus gang yin pa de thams cad kyang gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do //
translated: All of those are not two, nor are they divided.

translated: in that way, the nonexistence of bodhisattvas, the emptiness of bodhisattvas, the isolation of bodhisattvas, the essencelessness of bodhisattvas,
